subject: Date: Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:49
body:
Date: Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:49:59 -0800
Reply-To: 
ab5175305@gmail.com
Hello, With Due Respected,
I am Miss. Joel Kouyate. The only daughter to my late parents. I am 25 years old. Please can I trust you to be my guardian to help me secure my inheritance fund that my late father kept for me in the BANK before he met his untimely death? I will be waiting for your reply if you will like to help me for more details,
Your sincere daughter,
Miss. Joel Kouyate

subject: Re:   Date: Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:49
body:
Hello Miss Joel Kouyate,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your parents. I understand that you are looking for a guardian to help you secure your funds. Can you please provide me with more details about the situation? How much money is involved and what steps need to be taken to access it?

I would like to help, but I need more information before making any decisions. Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Tony
